alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lancaster and northwestern Chesterfield Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Pageland, or 21 miles west of Cheraw, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pageland, Chesterfield, Jefferson, Ruby, Mount Croghan, McFarlan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, High Point Fire Station, Tradesville, Bay Springs Fire Station, Forty Acre Rock Preserve, Taxahaw, Kershaw Correctional Institution, Chesterfield Detention Center and Central High School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
